combine(Text, Iterable<Pair>, Context) - Method in class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.ibm1.log.Combine
combine function in the IBM1 MapReduce job Given the same source and target sides word pairs ("e|f" ), it adds up the value that the mapped output gave the pair ("e|f") It outputs the source word as a key and a pair of target word and a double as value

combine function in the IBM1 MapReduce job Given the same source and target sides word pairs ("e|f" ), it adds up the value that the mapped output gave the pair ("e|f") It outputs the source word as a key and a pair of target word and a double as value

Configure - Class in de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper
A class that handles the configuration for the word alignment
Configure(String) - Constructor for class de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper.Configure
Initializes the Configure object with the configuration options taken from the specified configuration file The configuration file should have the following format: every line contains one key value pair. keys and values are split with ":" Required keys: source, target, output, root_dir Optional keys: ibm1, hmm, null_token, clean_up, reverse_order, log_prob, number_reducers For more details see the help message of the main program or the documentation
